name: Spooky Hunt (Emancus09)
description: Spooky Hunt is a game inspired by Duck Hunt and other NES and SNES games from the game resolution to the game sounds and everything in between. The assets are all original and the game was developed for a school assignment. The variant game mode allows you to fire continuously for a bit by pressing the space bar but is more difficult. This mode was added to meet course requirements. I recommend playing the normal mode. Enjoy!
